author: Yuthika Bhargava
text: Microsoft Corporation on Thursday said it was working towards integrating Aadhaar as a factor of authentication with its video-calling service Skype. “We have embraced this very unique ID system. We have been pursuing work to integrate it into Skype. Initially, it is being done on pilot basis,” Microsoft Corporation president Brad Smith said. — Yuthika Bhargava
title: Microsoft testing Skype integration with Aadhaar
